channel.title: Donator Items / Staff Items
channel.description:
Can someone give me a code to make a item requiring donator rank to weild? Also need code to make a item staff only tho. Would be apreciated, Thanks. ;D ;D
Souce: Delta (EvolutionX)

item.title: Donator Items / Staff Items
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

help this is not working

private static final int clickItem = thePacketId; public void packets() { int itemId = yourstream; case clickItem: if(itemId == youritemid && playerRights < 3) { sendMessage("You need to be donator to use this item"); } break; }
please be more specific

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Items / Staff Items
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

i already gave you something…
put the && playerRights == 3) { at the end of the first line.

lets say a clickable object is only for owners

if(objectID = objectID example: 778) && playerRights ==3) { do stuff; }

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Items / Staff Items
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Well referring to what usman555 said before my post, you should try something similar to this:

private static final int clickItem = thePacketId;
public void packets() {
int itemId = yourstream;
case clickItem:
if(itemId == youritemid && playerRights < 3) {
sendMessage("You need to be donator to use this item");
}
break;
}

I don’t know what Deltascape coding looks like so don’t judge me.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Items / Staff Items
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

[quote=“dragonchain, post:3, topic:341147”]I don’t think it’s aloud to just ask for codes out of the blue, how about try coding it yourself? And if you can’t just ask a question for help one by one, but please, don’t just ask someone to do something for you if you’re not going to give something in return.[/quote]I can give rep, and it a help section as i see this help is free and not need to pay in return for help. If you there to annoy me please just leave cause i really need this help.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Items / Staff Items
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

I don’t think it’s aloud to just ask for codes out of the blue, how about try coding it yourself? And if you can’t just ask a question for help one by one, but please, don’t just ask someone to do something for you if you’re not going to give something in return.
